item.title: 巴西 Azul 公司与债券持有人达成额外融资协议
item.description: 巴西航空公司 Azul 周一表示，该公司已与现有债券持有人集团达成协议，以获得额外融资，作为重组的一部分，该公司希望借此缓解市场对其高债务负担的担忧。【原文：Azul has reached a deal with its existing group of bondholders to obtain additional financing, the Brazilian airline said on Monday, as part of restructuring it expects to ease market concerns about its high debt load.】

item.title: 麦当劳大肠杆菌疫情可能加剧近期销售下滑
item.description: 麦当劳周二公布第三季度业绩报告时，投资者将寻找近期销售受大肠杆菌爆发影响的迹象。【原文：McDonald's investors will look for signs of near-term sales disruption from the recent E. coli outbreak linked to its Quarter Pounder hamburgers when it reports third-quarter results on Tuesday.】

item.title: 波音公司启动募股计划，筹集约 190 亿美元资金以支撑财务状况
item.description: 波音公司周一开始发行股票，可能筹集大约 190 亿美元的资金，因为这家飞机制造商希望加强因长达一个月的工人罢工和长达一年的安全危机而受到挤压的财务状况。【原文：Boeing on Monday launched a stock offering that could raise roughly $19 billion as the planemaker looks to strengthen its finances squeezed by a month-long worker strike and a year-long safety crisis.】

item.title: 劳资协议会负责人表示，大众计划大幅裁员，关闭至少三家德国工厂
item.description: 大众汽车公司工会主席周一表示，大众汽车计划关闭在德国的至少三家工厂，裁员数万人，并永久性缩减其在欧洲最大经济体的其余工厂，因为这家欧洲顶级汽车制造商正在谋划一场比预期更深入的改革。【原文：Volkswagen plans to shut at least three factories in Germany, lay off tens of thousands of staff and permanently shrink its remaining plants in Europe's biggest economy as the continent's top carmaker is plotting a deeper-than-expected overhaul, the works council head said on Monday.】

item.title: 微软的人工智能需求备受关注，投资者正在寻求发薪日
item.description: 微软预计将于周三公布一年来增长最慢的季度营收报告，同时投资者也在等待人工智能需求的迹象，因为他们越来越担心在该技术上的巨额投资回报缓慢。【原文：Microsoft is expected to report its slowest quarterly revenue growth in a year on Wednesday, while investors await signs of AI demand amid growing worries about the slow payoff from hefty investments in the technology.】

item.title: 市场翘首以盼美国大选和巨头财报，期指一路走高
item.description: 美国股指期货周一大涨，准备从动荡的一周交易中挽回一些损失，因为投资者准备迎接关键的企业财报和11月5日总统大选前的最后阶段。【原文：U.S. stock index futures surged on Monday, poised to recoup some losses from a turbulent trading week as investors prepared for key corporate earnings and the final phase before the Nov. 5 presidential election.】

item.title: 早间竞价：中东局势受限，日本举棋不定，石油和日元下跌
item.description: Mike Dolan 展望美国和全球市场的未来一天【原文：A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan】

item.title: 罗宾hood推出美国总统大选衍生品交易，竞选白热化
item.description: Robinhood 周一宣布推出美国总统大选事件合约，客户可以根据自己对副总统卡马拉-哈里斯和前总统唐纳德-特朗普之间激烈竞争的预测进行交易。【原文：Robinhood announced the launch of U.S. presidential election event contracts on Monday, enabling customers to trade based on their prediction for the tightly contested race between Vice President Kamala Harris and former President Donald Trump.】

item.title: 聚焦：大选在即，商业房地产业担心税收增加
item.description: 美国商业房地产业正在推动前共和党总统唐纳德-特朗普倡导的税收减免和激励措施在下届政府中继续实施，因为该行业正与不断激增的拖欠债务、创纪录的空置率和融资成本上升作斗争。【原文：The U.S. commercial real estate industry is pushing for tax relief and incentives championed by former Republican President Donald Trump to continue in the next administration, as the sector struggles with surging delinquencies, record vacancy rates, and elevated costs of financing.】

item.title: 马斯克对 2025 年特斯拉销量的大胆预测面临质疑和审查
item.description: 特斯拉公司首席执行官埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）计划明年汽车销量增长 30%，这让投资者和分析师们大吃一惊。【原文：Tesla CEO Elon Musk stunned investors and analysts with plans to grow vehicle sales by 30% next year, buoyed by a new, cheaper model and enthusiasm for self-driving software, but delivering on that promise would surprise much of Wall Street.】

item.title: 美联储在下一次政策会议前将面临繁重的数据和政治日程安排
item.description: 在距离美联储官员坐下来决定下一步利率行动的九天时间里，将发生一系列影响他们行动的事件--从关键的就业和通胀数据到激烈的美国总统大选，不一而足。【原文：The nine days until Federal Reserve officials sit down to decide what to do next with interest rates features a veritable murderers' row of events to shape their move - everything from key employment and inflation data to a closely fought U.S. presidential election.】

item.title: 辉瑞管理层希望在 Starboard 逼近之际展现转机
item.description: 辉瑞公司周二发布的季度财务报告对这家美国制药商及其首席执行官来说正值关键时刻，因为激进对冲基金 Starboard Value 加大了压力，要求其展示承诺的扭亏为盈的具体成果。【原文：Pfizer's quarterly financial report on Tuesday comes at a critical moment for the U.S. drugmaker and its CEO, as activist hedge fund Starboard Value ramps up the pressure to demonstrate concrete results of a promised turnaround.】

item.title: 由于搜索和 YouTube 面临竞争压力，Alphabet 第三季度营收增长可能放缓
item.description: 本周二，Alphabet 可能将公布四个季度以来最慢的收入增长，其核心业务谷歌搜索（Google Search）受到竞争影响，YouTube 的广告支出也有所减少。【原文：Alphabet will likely post its slowest revenue growth in four quarters on Tuesday, hurt by competition that weighed on its core Google Search business and dented YouTube ad spending.】

item.title: 专家称波音工人要求恢复养老金的愿望遥遥无期
item.description: 在许多人看来，波音公司工人为恢复其十年前放弃的传统养老金计划所做的努力似乎遥遥无期，因为恢复这种结构可能会加剧这家飞机制造商摇摇欲坠的财务状况。【原文：Boeing workers' efforts to restore the traditional pension plans it ditched a decade ago feels to many like a long shot, as reinstating such a structure could exacerbate the planemaker's shaky financial situation.】

item.title: 市场为为期两周的疯狂选举和利率变动做好准备
item.description: 在美国选出总统、日本面临政治瘫痪、三大央行确定利率以及英国新政府提交预算案的关键两周到来之前，全球投资者正纷纷涌入美元，并押注波动性将加剧。【原文：Investors globally are piling into the U.S. dollar and betting on rising volatility ahead of a crucial two weeks in which the United States picks a president, Japan faces political paralysis, three major central banks set interest rates and the new UK government presents its budget.】

item.title: 苹果 iPhone 16 在印尼的销售因当地零部件规定而受阻
item.description: 印尼工业部表示，科技巨头苹果公司（Apple Inc）将不被允许在印尼销售其iPhone 16智能手机，因为这些手机不符合印尼关于使用本地制造部件的规定。【原文：Tech giant Apple Inc will not be allowed to sell its iPhone 16 smartphones in Indonesia because they have not met the country's rules on the use of locally made components, the industry ministry said.】

item.title: 中国需求减弱，飞利浦下调销售展望
item.description: 荷兰医疗设备制造商飞利浦公司周一下调了今年的销售预期，原因是中国市场需求下降，导致其第三季度订单量下降了 2%。【原文：Dutch medical devices maker Philips on Monday lowered its sales forecast for the year due to declining demand in China, which pushed its order intake down 2% in the third quarter.】

item.title: 千亿美元贸易协定带来更多机遇，瑞士企业将目光投向印度
item.description: 工程集团 ABB 和运输公司 Kuehne+Nagel 等瑞士公司在印度的投资不断增加，一项价值 1,000 亿美元的地区贸易协议有望进一步向长期面向中国的企业开放。【原文：Investments in India by Swiss companies such as engineering group ABB and transport firm Kuehne+Nagel are on the rise, with a $100 billion regional trade deal expected to further open it up to businesses long geared towards China.】

item.title: Wunsch 称欧洲央行不急于加快宽松政策步伐
item.description: 比利时央行行长皮埃尔-翁施（Pierre Wunsch）表示，欧洲央行没有加快降息的紧迫性，它甚至可以接受通胀目标暂时小幅偏低的情况。【原文：There is no urgency for the European Central Bank to cut interest rates quicker and it could even live with a small, temporary undershoot of its inflation target, Belgian central bank chief Pierre Wunsch said, joining colleagues in pushing back on more dovish views.】

item.title: 在欧洲，实体店比点击率更受欢迎
item.description: 网购的兴起导致大量商店倒闭，使人们对零售商场和高街的未来产生了怀疑，但在欧洲，有迹象表明，商店正在重新流行起来，而且对于帮助推动网上销售非常重要。【原文：The rise of online shopping has led to swathes of store closures, casting doubt over the future of retail malls and high streets, but in Europe there are signs that shops are back in vogue and are important for helping to drive online sales.】

item.title: 中国再次警告欧盟不要与电动汽车制造商单独谈判
item.description: 中国商务部周一表示，中国再次警告欧盟，如果欧盟在与中国谈判的同时单独与电动汽车公司进行谈判，将 "动摇互信 "并干扰整体谈判。【原文：China renewed warnings to the European Union that if the bloc conducts separate negotiations with electric vehicle companies while in talks with China, that would "shake mutual trust" and interfere with the overall negotiations, Chinese commerce ministry said on Monday.】

item.title: 早间竞标本周活动风险重重
item.description: Vidya Ranganathan 对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Vidya Ranganathan】

item.title: 资产管理公司推出新的 ETF，利用人工智能的热潮
item.description: 随着资产管理公司为投资者提供利用市场对人工智能热情的新方法，专注于人工智能的交易所交易基金正在激增，尽管目前仍不清楚哪些公司将成为最新技术革命的长期赢家。【原文：Exchange-traded funds focused on artificial intelligence are proliferating as asset managers offer investors new ways to tap in to the market enthusiasm for AI, even while it remains unclear which companies will emerge as the long-term winners from the latest technology revolution.】

item.title: 中国经济复苏渺茫，部分企业改变策略
item.description: 随着房地产危机的持续和青年失业率的上升，中国客户正在削减开支。【原文：Chinese customers are cutting spending as the property crisis continues and youth unemployment rises.】

item.title: 欧洲航空公司第三季度因飞机延误和高成本而陷入困境
item.description: 包括汉莎航空（Lufthansa）和法荷航空（Air France-KLM）在内的欧洲主要航空公司预计将公布新一季的业绩报告，受成本上升和飞机数量有限的拖累，飞机制造商波音（Boeing）和空中客车（Airbus）推迟交货的情况也没有很快好转的迹象。【原文：Europe's major airlines including Lufthansa and Air France-KLM are expected to report another quarter dragged down by rising costs and limited planes, with no sign of delivery delays from planemakers Boeing and Airbus improving any time soon.】

item.title: 加息在即，日本央行努力加强沟通
item.description: 日本央行行长上田一夫在华盛顿出席国际货币基金组织和世界银行会议期间释放出的政策信号喜忧参半，除此之外，他还透露了日本央行正在就如何更好地与市场沟通进行反思。【原文：Aside from the mixed policy signals dropped during his trip to the International Monetary Fund and World Bank meetings in Washington, Bank of Japan Governor Kazuo Ueda offered a glimpse of how the central bank was doing some soul searching on ways to better communicate with markets.】

item.title: 韩国锌业试图以 15 亿美元的股票回购抵御收购
item.description: 韩国锌业公司（Korea Zinc）周一表示，它已在 15 亿美元的回购中获得了该公司 9.85% 的股份，该回购旨在阻止股东将其股份出售给其顶级投资者 Young Poong 和私募股权公司 MBK。【原文：Korea Zinc said on Monday it has secured 9.85% of the company's shares in a $1.5 billion buyback that it launched to block shareholders from selling their stakes to its top investor Young Poong and private equity firm MBK.】

item.title: 消息人士称，波音公司计划最早于下周一启动超过 150 亿美元的融资计划
item.description: 一位知情人士告诉路透社，波音公司最早将于下周一启动融资超过 150 亿美元的计划。【原文：Boeing is set to launch as early as Monday its plan to raise more than $15 billion in capital, a source briefed on the matter told Reuters.】

item.title: 中国民办教师培训公司在打压后走出阴影
item.description: 目前还没有正式承认政策发生了变化。但现在政策制定者已经默许家教行业的发展，这是中国政府支持创造就业机会的一个举措。【原文：There has been no formal acknowledgement of a change in policy. But there is now tacit consent from policymakers to allow the tutoring industry to grow, in a pivot by Beijing to support job creation.】

item.title: 礼来获准在香港推出减肥药 - 彭博新闻社
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周日报道，礼来公司预计最早将于今年年底开始在香港销售其减肥药物。【原文：Eli Lilly expects to start selling its weight-loss drug in Hong Kong as early as the end of this year, Bloomberg News reported on Sunday.】
